text: 2:26 Ofa Gami 24:9Devit Godɨn Purirpenimɨn aven ghua me ofa damuasa atɨzir bretɨn rubuziba inigha uan adarazi ko me da ame. An da apava, uaghan maba isa uan gumazibagh anɨngizɨma, me uaghan da ame. Dughiar kam Abiatar, ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim itima, Devit bretɨn kaba ame. Judabar arazir kam iti. Bretɨn kaba ofa gamir gumazibaram ada api, gumazamizir kɨniba puvatɨ. Ezɨ Devit, a gumazir kɨnim, egha a bretɨn kaba ame.”
